email_text:
Subject: Your LinkedIn Password Has Been Successfully Changed

Dear [Name],

This is to inform you that the password for your LinkedIn account has been successfully changed. Your account security is of utmost importance to us, and we want to ensure that your information remains protected.

If you did not initiate this password change, please contact us immediately at [LinkedIn customer support email or phone number]. We recommend that you also change the passwords for any other accounts that use the same or similar credentials as your LinkedIn account.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Best regards,

The LinkedIn Team
